```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
View(flights)

```

```{r}
plot(flights$air_time, flights$distance)

```

```{r}

flights_2 <- sampled_data <- flights[sample(nrow(flights), 1000), ]
plot <- ggplot(flights_2, aes(x=air_time,y=distance)) +
         geom_point(aes(color = arr_delay),size = 1) +
        scale_color_gradient(low = "darkslateblue", high = "red")
  
plot + labs(color = "Arrival Delay")
```
